channel.title: Blogs on Nam Tran
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Nam Tran

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This is that obligatory hello world post that always comes with any sort of programming adventure. I’ve decided to reboot this website since the last time anything done with it was high school. This is also my second attempt at a blog. Eventually, I am going to port over the blog posts from my original wordpress I tried to make last year.

item.title: First Blog, An Explanation
item.description: EDIT: This blog post comes unedited from my (now nonexistent) Wordpress blog. Pictures have not been included, however. I have begun to write code in Emacs, and compile from a command line. As this is my first blog entry, I should explain why I chose such a masochistic path. I only ever took one technology course ever. It was “Introduction to Computer Science” and was taken purely to fulfill a high school graduation requirement.
